name: Dicey Delivery
description:
Dicey Delivery

Made for the GMTK game jam (Roll of the dice theme)

I recommend downloading an executable if possible. The web build is a bit annoying.

This game is an arcade game, where you try to survive as long as possible. You lose once any of the dice buildings get down to tier one. You win if you manage to survive for a VERY long time.

Beware the game can soft lock you off spawn, I left it in because I thought it was funny. If it happens you can just go back to the main menu, then back into the game.

[Controls]

WASD or arrow keys to move

Move into a building to load / unload dice

Escape to enter/exit menus

[Tutorial]

The building in the center is the dice factory, you can pick up dice from it by walking into it. After you do this they are stored in your inventory. You can use those dice to increment buildings up one tier. Keep doing this to survive.

[Credits]

Font - Roboto

Colors -Cold Light by A_Lamp

Music:

Ambient music - Sounds provided by Erokia/Jordan Powell from Freesound.org

Crickets - Sounds provided by caquet from Freesound.org

[Tools]

Aseprite

Audacity

Unity
